original_text: And many nations shall join themselves to the Lord in that day, and shall be my people. And I will dwell in your midst, and you shall know that the Lord of hosts has sent me to you.
korean_text: 그 날에 많은 나라가 여호와께 속하여 내 백성이 될 것이요 나는 네 가운데에 머물리라 네가 만군의 여호와께서 나를 네게 보내신 줄 알리라

sentences.original_text: And many nations shall join themselves to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 민족들이 주께 속하게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: And I will dwell in your midst
that the Lord of hosts has sent me to you
